:• 2x '''867''' Mbps - 2-stream 802.11ac device (433 Mbps per stream), :• 1x '''400''' Mbps - max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''AC2200'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC2200 Tri-Band Mesh Router with Smart Speaker}} :[https://www.asus.com/us/Networking/Lyra-Voice/ Product page] {{SupportPage|vendor=ASUS|region=us|model=Lyra-Voice}} *Web GUI: http://router.asus.com 2-in-1 Smart Assistant and AC2200 Tri-Band Mesh WiFi Router :Two 8W Stereo Speakers, with Built-in Amazon Alexa, :AiProtection network security powered by Trend Micro *[http://www.apkmirror.com/apk/asustek-computer-inc/asus-lyra/ ''ASUS Lyra app'' on '''APKMirror'''] :Android ASUS Lyra App v1.0.0.0.20 :Compatibility Models: :*[[ASUS Lyra]] (MAP-AC2200) :*[[ASUS Lyra Mini]] (MAP-AC1300) :*[[ASUS Lyra Trio]] (MAP-AC1750) :*[[ASUS Lyra Voice]] (AC2200) ===Overview=== *'''Whole Home WiFi Range''' — Tri-band mesh network compatible with Lyra :series ensures a strong connection in every corner of your home *'''Simple, Intuitive Access to Smart Devices''' — Built-in, hands-free help from :Amazon Alexa answers your questions and controls smart home devices *'''Rich and Powerful Sound''' — Exclusive audio technology lets you enjoy your :music in stereo sound with deeper bass and a wider frequency range *'''Complete Network Security for Your Family''' — Lifetime free AiProtection :powered by Trend Micro protects all connected devices, IoT appliances *'''You’re in Control''' — The ASUS Lyra app enables PC-free setup, network :management and diagnostics, and notifies you about any problems ===News=== *[http://promos.asus.com/US/PR_2019/ces_Lyra_Voice/index.html ''ASUS Announces Lyra Voice'' on '''Promos ASUS'''] *[http://edgeup.asus.com/2018/lyra-voice-lyra-trio-bring-alexa-functionality-affordable-flexibility-to-your-mesh-network/ ''ASUS Lyra Voice and Lyra Trio'' on '''EdgeUp ASUS'''] *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2018/33179-asus-expands-lyra-mesh-family ''CES 2018 - ASUS Lyra Home Wi-Fi System'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===See also=== *[[ASUS Blue Cave]] - ''AC2600 Dual-Band Smart Wi-Fi Router'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/Blue-Cave/ PPage] :128MB Flash, 512MB RAM, [[Intel]] Wi-Fi, IFTTT, IoT • [https://www.engadget.com/2017/05/29/asus-blue-cave-wireless-router/ Computex 2017] *[[ASUS Lyra]] - ''AC2200 Tri-Band Whole-Home Wi-Fi System'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/Lyra/ PPage] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 (2T2R 802.11abgn/ac) + QCA9886 (2T2R 5GHz) :*[[ASUS HiveSpot]] - ''AC2200 Multi-Point Wi-Fi System'' • CES 2017 *[[ASUS Lyra Mini]] - ''AC1300 Whole-Home Wi-Fi System'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/Lyra-Mini/ PPage] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 @717MHz Quad Core (2T2R 802.11abgn/ac) :*[[ASUS HiveDot]] - ''AC1300 Multi-Point Wi-Fi System'' • CES 2017 *[[ASUS Lyra Trio]] - ''AC1750 Dual Band Mesh Wi-Fi System'' • [https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2018/33179-asus-expands-lyra-mesh-family CES 2018] *[[ASUS Lyra Voice]] - ''AC2200 Tri-Band Mesh Router with Smart Speaker'' __NOTOC__
